dsOverview.title: India INSAT Visual and Infrared Images, 1984Apr-1989Mar

summary.p: The Indian Meteorological Department has provided satellite data from the Indian National Satellit (INSAT) for the period April 1984 to March 1989. Data are available twice-daily until April 1988 when data become available 8 times daily.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Visible Wavelengths > Visible Imagery
